string.text:
A tool with a large, heavy head attached to a long handle. Allows gathering momentum during a swing to apply massive amounts of force.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Various
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] melee weapon
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] greater reach compared to knives
